plot( data.graph(p->p.x, p->p.a).mark(1,blue) .line(blue.dash(7,7),"a"), data.graph(p->p.x, p->p.b).mark(2,green).line(green.dash(7,7),"b"), ).legendPos(0.2,15)
plot( graph( x->sin(x) ).line(black, "sin(x)"), graph( x->cos(x) ).line(blue, "cos(x)"), graph( x->tan(x) ).line(red, "tan(x)") ).cross() .xBounds(-pi,pi) .yBounds(-2,2)
